Articles.Content:
[quote name='Sequinox']Yes, it is updated to 1.0.5. ;\_;[/QUOTE]  

Sweet. Does it come with Frowny Manley? Also, I want Angry Manley. MUST COLLECT THEM ALL
It only comes with 666 Manleys.
Of all of Scott's faces you could on a Kerbal, you pick the most disturbing one possible!!
Removed a couple of nonsense posts. Keep the discussions on-topic, please.

Jesus christ. I almost forget about that mod... Should I start working on brand new just for upcoming 1.10 KSP 64-bit version of my glorious mod? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
This gets scarier every time I look at it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

> 
> 
> On 1.2.2016 at 6:12 AM, Potatto said:
> 
> 
> Jesus christ. I almost forget about that mod... Should I start working on brand new just for upcoming 1.10 KSP 64-bit version of my glorious mod?
> 

Do it!
\*screaming in agony\*

P... Please... For all that is good and just in the world... Show me mercy and... ***KILL MEE.....***

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-28T07:17:55Z" title="03/28/2016 07:17  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 28, 2016</time> by Andem**

> 
> 
> On 1/31/2016 at 0:12 AM, Potatto said:
> 
> 
> Jesus christ. I almost forget about that mod... Should I start working on brand new just for upcoming 1.10 KSP 64-bit version of my glorious mod? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
> 

Yes. Do it.

Great Scott!

~~Kill it with fire!~~
BAHAHAHAHAAAAA
Should I be worried I'm laughing like a maniac at this?
Please kill these kerbals. PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

> 
> 
> On ‎2015‎-‎07‎-‎19 at 11:48 PM, Scotius said:
> 
> 
> This is stuff the horrors are made of ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) This abomination needs to be killed with silver bullets and napalm. And then shot into the Sun.
> 

you're right, KILL IT WITH NUKES AND BULLETS!!!!!!

> 
> 
> On 7/19/2015 at 9:47 PM, Potatto said:
> 
> 
> ![D76DeF4.png](http://i.imgur.com/D76DeF4.png)
> 
> 
> Spoiler
> 
> 
> 
> 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-04T06:52:17Z" title="08/04/2016 06:52  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 4, 2016</time> by Souper**

Mr Potatto, Mr Potatto, you are the most creative modder EVER.

With all due respect to the human instruction manual that is Scott Manley, this is the most hilarious thing in the history of KSP.

See, when I was new to Kerbal I used to watch Manley's videos to learn a bit about the game but my ears used to burn off and my skin used to get goose bumps whenever he tried one of his try-hard creative speeches, usually ending with "blah blah ...... or something like that".  So the irony of this mod does not escape me!  I just love it so much ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**O.M.G^tm^** What have you done with ~~human~~ kerbal sense?

I love it.
This... sort of makes me wonder if Scott has a forum account.

> 
> 
> 20 minutes ago, pTrevTrevs said:
> 
> 
> This... sort of makes me wonder if Scott has a forum account.
> 

Yes, Mr. Manley is around sometimes. He commented this thread on the first page.  

Great mod btw, sadly some comments are silly.
Yeah. Gonna have to necro this, just because I just found it. Wow. Just wow. @Potatto, this needs a medical warning on the tin... I applaud you, and think you should be punished at the same time.
***We were too busy trying to see if we could, that we didn't stop to think if we should.***

[@Potatto](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/128015-potatto/) last posted in February 2016, so he's probably not going to update this.

Therefore, in accordance with the terms of the CC-BY-NC-SA license (I think?), and to keep this masterpiece alive for future generations, here's a version for KSP 1.3.1, updated to work with either TextureReplacerReplaced or SigmaReplacementsHeads:

- [https://drive.google.com/open?id=1X9vBLb9C5t2G5qfPCmtN_R-kF035UBPo](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1X9vBLb9C5t2G5qfPCmtN_R-kF035UBPo)

Also added to <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>.

![iCaS15g.png](https://i.imgur.com/iCaS15g.png)

(I couldn't figure out how to hide the stock eyes.)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-23T17:57:02Z" title="12/23/2017 05:57  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 23, 2017</time> by HebaruSan**

Heaven help us.

It's back.
